content: TE-Y BT Bushing tools SDS Max (TE-Y) bushing tool for surface work and layer removal in concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Carbide pins – for smoother surface removal and higher wear resistance Pre-assembled – bushing bit and shank in one, delivered ready to use Ultra-robust – inductive hardening makes these bushing tools especially resistant to mushrooming, wear and bending Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Built for tough jobs – tested for extreme use, our chisels are made to power through your most demanding demolition work Applications Removing excess concrete Roughening concrete surfaces to better receive new coatings For use with SDS Max (TE-Y) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 9.8 in Bushing head dimensions (L x W): 40 mm x 40 Connection end: TE-Y (SDS Max) Technical Data | Connection end | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Application | Surface preparation | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2429806 - Bushing tool TE-Y BT 4x4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2207028 - Bushing Tool TE-YX BT 4x4 cm - Package Size 1 pc
